tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Dania for the past 12 years, starting when my son was almost 2 years old. Unlike other doctors we consulted, Dr. Dania showed remarkable patience and skill in treating such a small child. My son quickly grew fond of him.

Dr. Dania's explanations and treatments for our dental issues are always thorough and satisfying. He truly embodies the meaning of "DENTIST" – a doctor, engineer, and artist.

I am deeply grateful for his time and efforts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I've been a patient of Dr. Dania for 15+ years now, and I can confidently say that my experiences have consistently exceeded expectations. From the moment you step into the clinic, you're greeted with warmth and professionalism that instantly puts you at ease.

Dr. Dania is not only highly professional but also ********** ************* *** skilled in his craft. His expertise is evident in every aspect of the care he provides. Whether it's a routine check-up or a more complex procedure, he takes the time to explain everything thoroughly, ensuring that you're comfortable and informed every step of the way.

One of the standout qualities of Dr. Dania's practice is the impeccable hygiene standards maintained throughout the clinic. The cleanliness and hygiene protocols are top-notch, which is particularly reassuring, especially in the current climate. You can trust that every precaution is taken to ensure a safe and sanitary environment for patients.

But what truly sets Dr. Dania apart is the exceptional quality of care he delivers. He pays meticulous attention to detail, and it's clear that he genuinely cares about the well-being of his patients. Whether it's a simple cleaning or a more complex procedure, he approaches each case with the same level of dedication and precision.

What's more, I always leave Dr. Dania's office feeling completely satisfied with the results. Not only does he achieve outstanding outcomes, but he also goes above and beyond to ensure your comfort and satisfaction throughout the entire process.

Overall, I cannot recommend Dr. Dania highly enough. If you're looking for a dentist who is professional, hygienic, and consistently delivers exceptional care, look no further.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr dania for re-rct treatment. He suggested that re-rct was not required. All that was required was a change of old tooth crown by a new crown. He did a temporary filing of the tooth. I started experiencing immense pain on the very next day. Called him multiple times and messaged him thereafter. He did not respond at all. He just suggested a pain killer and asked me to come again after 5 days. I insisted if i could see me in a day or two to get rid of the pain and to reassure is re- rct was required. He did not respond at all.
******* * *** ** *** ****** **** ***** ****** *** *** *** ******* **** **** ***** ****** ** he was not ready to see me before the date of appointment given by him. Would not recommend him or refer him ever again after seeing this unprofessionalism although he took entire amount before handing over the crown to me even when i did not got it affixed from him.
reply_text:
I would like to clarify a few things here , Mr Kalra
1. You came to me with a complaint of swollen gums wrt a tooth- on examination I saw food lodgment as a cause for the swelling and the X-ray taken showed decay below the crown of an already root canal treated tooth. The treatment was discussed at length and the following was suggested- remove the old crown , remove the decay, fill the tooth and then take measurements for a new crown which would have good contact with the adjacent tooth and hence no food lodgment and hence no swelling in the gums. 
2. The next appointment was scheduled on the next working day of the clinic and the above mentioned treatment was carried out and an appointment fixed for crown cementation. I disagree with your observation that a temporary filling was done- the filling done was a composite filling which is a permanent one!
3. I usually do NOT take calls when I am treating a patient but I do msg them as and when I get free(as I did in your case).
4. You msgd me on Thursday and wanted me to see you on the same day but I replied that I would see you as scheduled  on Friday ( as Thursday the clinic is closed!)- and NOT in a day or two as you have wrongly written in your feedback! 
5. Lastly, the amount was charged as the filling was done and the crown was fabricated and at NO POINT did you tell me NOT to go ahead with the crown work. The decision to take 2nd/3rd opinion is entirely yours n  I wish you the best in the future 👍
6. This is my longest reply to a feedback as I wanted to bring out my opinion on the matter.

review:
Well Dr.Dania s explanation of could or should be done without delay was very confusing.
Secondly he asserted that a front tooth which is longer than my other front teeth was like that as my original tooth  which is absolutely not the case.*** *** ******** * ******* ******** ** **** ** ****** ** ******** ********* *** ******* ** *** ******** **** ** *** ********I would say it was not a very positive session for a rate which was very high and for being informed that there may be much higher expenditure than foreseen in the near future for new teeth in front on the upper jaw.
It left me very confused  and  not convinced .Sorry to say.
reply_text:
I and other doctors in the clinic have been treating you for over 2 decades now, ma’m. It is my observation that you always end up getting piecemeal procedures done and not a comprehensive treatment as is advised to you- as a result, whenever you come later ( i.e when you face a problem! ) the treatment  plan undergoes a change and since more procedures are needed the costs will go up too!!
As regards your observation of high costs of treatment in the clinic - I feel we charge for our expertise and time which will always go up with time .
 You are also aware that you have always been given a discount just out of courtesy since you have been our patient since long- which you haven’t mentioned in your feedback !
